title: Ancient Worlds.(Arhaioi Kosmoi) Tv series. greek subs.(episode 3
description:
H megali symparagogi toy SKAI(Elladas) kai toy BBC mas
ksenagi se ena synarpastiko taksidi istorikis anakalipsis:apo ti gennisi ton ethnon,eos tin anaptyksi tis thriskias kai tis protes sygroyseis anamesa sti dynami kai ti thelisi,to nomo kai tin koinoniki eleftheria.
  Ektinetai se tris ipiroys,istorikoi, arxeologoi kai
alloi eidikoi mas miloyn gia tis protes poleis.

  The big co-production of SKAI TV(Greece) and the BBC
takes us to an exciting journey of historic discoveries: from the birth of nations, to the discovery of religion and the very first conflicts
between the power and will, the law and social freedom.
  In all three continents, historians, archeologists
and other specialists tell us about the first cities.

3o epeisodio:
  O Richard Miles anakalyptei oli ti dynami alla kai ola ta paradoxa poy kryvei i Ellada, opoy anthisan oi tehnes, i philosophia kai oi epistimes alla taytohrona
kai oi entones koinonikes adikies, i politiki dihonia
kai oi ateleiotoi polemoi. Ellada: I hora poy protoporoyse kai exakoloythei na protoporei se epipedo
politikon systimaton kai ohi mono...
  
3rd episode:
  Richard Miles discovers all the strength but at the same time, all the paradoxes of Greece, a land that grew arts, philosophy and science but also social injustices, political confrontations and endless wars.
  Greece: the land that pioneered and still is, in political systems' level and not only...
